song_name: Baba Nam Kevalam kiirtan on the ukulele
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Baba Nam Kevalam kiirtan on the ukulele is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Baba Nam Kevalam kiirtan on the ukulele is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
